entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 10:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -31.2°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
